shadow.name: DISTRACTION
shadow.description: The shadow frequency of The Wanderer, expressing through distraction

gift.name: ENRICHMENT
gift.description: The gift frequency of The Wanderer, expressing through enrichment

siddhi.name: INTOXICATION
siddhi.description: The siddhi frequency of The Wanderer, expressing through intoxication

inversion_protocols.script: This is Gate 56 shadow frequency. The distraction you're experiencing is a distortion of your natural enrichment. Through awareness and experimentation, you can shift from distraction to enrichment.
inversion_protocols.somatic_anchor: Feel into your throat. Notice the sensation of distraction.

experiment.hypothesis: If I work with Gate 56 consciously for 7 days, the distraction pattern will shift toward enrichment.
experiment.action: Daily practice working with Gate 56 energy.

success_criteria.target: Noticeable shift from distraction toward enrichment
